control_attributes.Control: PL-4 (1) SOCIAL MEDIA AND NETWORKING RESTRICTIONS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization includes in the rules of behavior, explicit restrictions on the use of social media/networking sites and posting organizational information on public websites.

Control Statement: The organization includes in the rules of behavior, explicit restrictions on the use of social media/networking sites and posting organizational information on public websites.
Control Name: PL-4 (1) SOCIAL MEDIA AND NETWORKING RESTRICTIONS
